Kettlebell Training for Climbing and Descending

If you're looking to improve your riding, take a look at this kettlebell workout with Robin Vieira! From lunge rotations to truck drivers, Robin's workout focuses on building strength, stability, and endurance for climbing and descending.

Watch the Video

What We Do

We exist to encourage more women to experience the best of mountain biking.

Our Mission & More

Our Lifetime Warranty

All new Juliana bicycles come with a lifetime warranty on the frame and lifetime bearing replacements for the original registered owner. If you didn’t know, now you know.

Read More

Find a Shop

The local bike shop is the cornerstone of the mountain bike community. Swing by yours to see the newest bikes and latest builds for yourself.

Find a Shop
